text: The war over ` ` Sex and the City 3'' wages on and now Stanford Blanch is getting in on the action. Actor Willie Garson, who played Carrie Bradshaw's gay BFF on the series, fired off a tweet referencing the drama surrounding the demise of the third movie. His message heavily implied Kim Cattrall did show interest in the project before walking away from it entirely, even though she maintains she never wanted to do it. ` ` Dear fans, because I'm'toxic ', I'm going to negotiate a contract for 6 months, not come to terms, then say I never wanted to do it anyway,'' he said on Wednesday.
